DOC.brief_summary: The study consist Phase1b lead-in portion determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) OMP-59R5 combination nab-paclitaxel gemcitabine follow Phase 2 , multicenter , randomize , placebo-controlled portion evaluate efficacy safety OMP-59R5 combination nab-paclitaxel gemcitabine subject previously untreated stage IV pancreatic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1b/2 Study OMP-59R5 Combination With Nab-Paclitaxel Gemcitabine Subjects With Previously Untreated Stage IV Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet follow major inclusion criterion eligible study : 1 . 18 year age old 2 . Histologically cytologically document stage IV ductal adenocarcinoma pancreas . 3 . Performance Status ( ECOG ) 0 1 4 . FFPE tumor tissue metastatic site ( 5 . Adequate organ function 6 . Written consent IRB/IECapproved Informed Consent Form prior studyspecific evaluation . 7 . For woman childbearing potential , negative serum pregnancy test screening use physicianapproved method birth control 30 day prior first study drug administration 30 day follow last study drug administration . 8 . Male subject must surgically sterile must agree use physicianapproved contraception 30 day prior first study drug administration 30 day follow last study drug administration . Subjects meet follow major exclusion criterion eligible participation study : 1 . Neuroendocrine tumor ( i.e. , carcinoid , islet cell cancer ) pancreas . 2 . Known brain metastasis . 3 . Prior therapy , include systemic therapy , surgical resection radiation newly diagnose stage IV pancreatic cancer . 4 . Presence serious unstable concomitant systemic disorder incompatible clinical study ( e.g. , substance abuse , uncontrolled intercurrent illness include active infection , arterial thrombosis , symptomatic pulmonary embolism ) . 5 . Any disorder would significantly compromise protocol compliance . 6 . Prior nonpancreatic malignancy treat chemotherapy . Prior malignancy treat surgery and/or radiotherapy alone must remission â‰¥3 year . The following prior malignancy allowable irrespective occur : situ carcinoma cervix , situ ductal breast cancer , lowgrade local bladder cancer , nonmelanotic skin cancer . 7 . Known human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection . 8 . Females pregnant breastfeeding .
DOC.keyword: Newly diagnose Stage IV Pancreatic Cancer
